articles.author: James "Rev Shark" DePorre
articles.title: Investor Anxiety Turns to Disgust as World Sells Off U.S. Assets - TheStreet Pro
articles.description: The market is falling lower on Trump chaos and there are no signs of technical support.
articles.content: The market action has been very poor for a while, but the mood took an ugly turn on Monday. Stocks, bonds and the dollar were all hit hard, and investors are becoming disgusted and angry with the lac… [+2385 chars]
